ygData.subject: RE: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Agree with almost all of this! The vendor (named Aviak at the very top of the village) won t sell to Barbarians either, tried last night. Other thing, SOME of
ygData.messageBody:
Agree with almost all of this! The vendor (named Aviak at the very top of
the village) won't sell to Barbarians either, tried last night. Other thing,
SOME of the aviaks (I think egrets, the lowest ones, maybe some others) can
keep up with SOW. I think it's only egrets, unless they changed it in the
last couple of months.

-Leod, SOK, Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: dlobdell [mailto:dlobdell@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 7:08 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting


From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>

Between lvl 20 and 30 as a wizard my main "kiting grounds" were around tha
Aviak village in South Karana.. that is absolutly a kiters heaven... YES
wizards CAN kite!!! There are on average 10 to 15 plus druid and/or shamans
in the area at any given time. And it is quite easy to have a constant
sow... Playing there was amazingly great.. Even when there were 40 plus ppl
in the zone i didnt have much trouble gaining xp fast. And the loot is
great. When high enough to kill avocets, the hardest aviaks there... you get
great loot, they sometimes drop black pearls worth 50 plus pp to other
players. and other assorted jewels that sell for 10 to 15 pp at a npc. And
the zone rathe zone is near incase of trouble. There is even an aviak
merchant that will sell to some ppl. I know it wont sell to gnomes.. dont
know what other races it dislikes though. And best of all, aviaks have NO
FACTION hits! And for those new to kiting, dont be afraid to try to kite a
yellow or red... If you smack it and it turns out it resists to much just
hit the zone, and you'll know from then on... If not, then rack in the xp!

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: "The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the
universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us."

-----Original Message-----
From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 12:56 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting


>From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
>Shaman's are the best kiters right? B/c they get SoW at 9th, and Druids
>don't get it till 14th...or are the Druid DOTs that much better?
>
>hmmm...maybe I will stick with the shaman :).
>
>Omeg
>
